revision.text:
<languages/> {{Infobox dungeon |name = New Mauville |image = [[File:New Mauville.png|300px]] |caption = An inside view of New Mauville. |tokens = 24,000 |location = South of Mauville City, East of Route 110. }} '''New Mauville''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 460,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite || colspan=2 rowspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton || rowspan=2|<center>1,650,000 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode |- |}
==Items==
===No Debuff===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 3 || 32.13% || 30.93% || 25.99% |- | {{Bag2|Cheri}} || 3 || 32.13% || 30.93% || 25.99% |- | {{Pokemon|Voltorb}} || N/A || 10.71% || 10.31% || 8.66% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 20.01% || 21.04% || 25.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Razz}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 2.01% || 2.61% || 5.05% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |}
===Debuff Drop Table===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || 3 || 32.14% || 32.14% || 32.14% |- | {{Bag2|Cheri}} || 3 || 32.14% || 32.14% || 32.14% |- | {{Pokemon|Voltorb}} || N/A || 10.71% || 10.71% || 10.71% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 24.00% || 24.00% || 24.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Razz}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.45% || 0.45% || 0.45% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |}
